snippet.title: Game & Watch - Donkey Kong Hockey (Micro Vs. System) (c)1984 Nintendo [MAME emulation footage]
snippet.description:
While not sold under the Game & Watch brand the Micro Vs. System titles are widely considered to be part of that series.  The units are designed for 1 or 2 players, with Game B being the 2 player game.  This is Donkey Kong Hockey "Micro Vs. System" running in MAME. The emulation was done by Algestam, while the artwork was provided by DarthMarino.  Many thanks also to Ryan Holtz for helping to organize and secure units for studying etc.  With the emulation of this game all of the Game & Watch titles are emulated in MAME.

Artwork can be found at https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1vl9O-0jIGCHHY_lrWpOwBtqTXEKsVGOY
